action.primary: Eliminates abdominal masses, removes toxicity, induces diuresis, eliminate dampness, kills parasites and alleviates pain

indications: Scabies, abdominal masses, edema, infantile malnutrition, scrofula, chronic tracheitis, tympanites, dorsal furuncle, carbuncles on the back, obstinate sores

notes: Decoct a toad in water for oral ingestion, or make into pills or powder.
This herb inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
